remarks: A restricted power series algebra has the same addition operation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jul-2015.)
statement:
resspsr.s $e |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) $.
resspsr.h $e |- H = ( R |`s T ) $.
resspsr.u $e |- U = ( I mPwSer H ) $.
resspsr.b $e |- B = ( Base ` U ) $.
resspsr.p $e |- P = ( S |`s B ) $.
resspsr.2 $e |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) $.
resspsradd $p |- ( ( ph /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) -> ( X ( +g ` U ) Y ) = ( X ( +g ` P ) Y ) ) $.
